items.title: David Walliams denies inappropriate behaviour after publisher drops him
items.description: Walliams is one of the UK's most successful children's authors, having sold more than 60 million books.

items.title: Tourists to face â‚¬2 fee to get near Rome's Trevi Fountain
items.description: Visitors who don't live in Rome will have to pay to view the Baroque monument up close from February.

items.title: Foreign prison officers exempted from stricter visa rules
items.description: It follows warnings some jails were facing a staffing crisis after salary requirements were raised.

items.title: Putin tells BBC Western leaders deceived Russia
items.description: BBC Russia editor Steve Rosenberg had the opportunity to ask Vladimir Putin about his plans for the future of the country.

items.title: Resident doctors in Scotland to go on strike for first time
items.description: Their union BMA Scotland has accused the government of reneging on a commitment to restore pay to 2008 levels.
